channel.title: WiFi Access point+cellular
channel.description:
Today we use Raspberry Pi in our facilities as an edge server. It communicates with our devices on WiFi and aggregates/processes data and forwards to our AWS cloud.
I want to add cellular support to this edge device, but I’m not locked into continuing to use the Pi.
I’m wondering if the Mangoh platform could be used to build a device that can function as a WiFi access point and cellular modem?
